attributes.action: Allow all MPs who mis-used their expenses to be charged with Benefit Fraud
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government regularly ask the public to shop a benefit thief.
Who are bigger Benefit thieves than MP?

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament. http://www.parliament.uk
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
